column5: Well after a tough morning ( zero fish) I asked Steve for some advice where to fish this evening ............And man did he come threw for me............We hammered them............8 fish caught kept 7..........The bite is on go see Fishmaster he'll put you on them.........Most of the fish we're caught on small buckshots (silver and black was the hot ticket) unfortunately for me my brother had the only one......... glows only caught a couple fish..........I hope you have some in stock I'll be needing some in the morning............ See you bright and early.........Here's a couple pics...............JHM ;D ;D ;D ;D
Nice fish,  We did really well just down from the shop this weekend.  It was our first time their and we were very impressed!
The fish you guys are catching are amazing... well done ... WOW!  Nice Meeting you all this weekend!  Cheers,  Jen
WOW!! Awesome fishing that's for sure!

It has been awesome fishing out here guys!  Hopefully it keeps up until the Walleye tournament we are having here on the 23rd of February.  I half expected to get a chance to meet you both here this weekend.  Maybe before the ice goes out!  Cheers,  Jen
nice fish, but where's the mudskippers or mudpuppies or whatever the frick they call them down there
Haven't seen anyone catching any of those here... only walleye coming through the ice on the river, in the marina are crappies, bass and bluegill
WTG guys nice Wall-ice they look pretty frozen.
really, doesn't Dunnville have a whole festival named after these creepy little buggers
LOL... yes Rizzo, but they are called Cat Fish...  Dunnville puts on a MUD CAT festivle every year!
I dropped a line down for channel cats on Sunday, lol, never got any
